cause.description:
Parents and overly-mature college students the world over have had enough. If the use of foul language does not cease immediately, someone is going to get their neck wrung.
1. Foul language has no place in this world.
2. The use of God's name in vain is unacceptable.
3. We will wash your mouth out with soap.
cause.mission: end the use of profane language, including the use of God's name in vain.
cause.name: Stop the Swearing
